select g.id, g.group_name, g.group_image, g.gmt_last_message gmtLastMessage, g.book_id, t.textbook_name bookName, (select CONCAT(pge.display_name,':',pgm.msg_content)msg_content from pmph_group_message pgm LEFT JOIN pmph_group_member pge on pgm.member_id=pge.id where pgm.group_id=g.id and pgm.member_id >0 ORDER BY pgm.gmt_create desc LIMIT 0,1) as msg_content, if(g.gmt_create>IFNULL(g.gmt_last_message,0) ,g.gmt_create,gmt_last_message)as gmtOrder from pmph_group g LEFT JOIN textbook t ON g.book_id = t.id where g.id in ( select DISTINCT group_id from pmph_group_member where user_id = #{id} and is_writer = false AND is_deleted = FALSE )
and g.group_name like concat(concat('%',#{pmphGroup.groupName}),'%')
GROUP BY g.id order by gmtOrder desc

SELECT g.id, g.group_name, g.group_image, g.gmt_last_message gmtLastMessage, g.book_id, t.textbook_name bookName, (select CONCAT(pge.display_name,':',pgm.msg_content) msg_content from pmph_group_message pgm LEFT JOIN pmph_group_member pge on pgm.member_id=pge.id where pgm.group_id=g.id and pgm.member_id >0 ORDER BY pgm.gmt_create desc LIMIT 0,1) as msg_content, if(g.gmt_create>IFNULL(g.gmt_last_message,0) ,g.gmt_create,gmt_last_message)as gmtOrder, COUNT(f.id) files FROM pmph_group g LEFT JOIN textbook t ON g.book_id = t.id LEFT JOIN pmph_group_file f ON f.group_id = g.id where 1=1
and g.group_name like concat('%',#{groupName},'%')
GROUP BY g.id order by gmtOrder desc
